title: Les Delices du Liban
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Middle Eastern, Lebanese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A Lebanese buffet restaurant located in front of the Theatre de l'Archipel. The owner is kind and helpful; he will give you the detail of each meal available in the buffet. All the starters are vegan, some main courses are vegan, a couple of desserts are vegan. On-site menu is around 16 euros/pp (as of Dec 2015) and it's all-you-can-eat buffet including a drink.
